channel.title: Committees on SwissRN
channel.description: Recent content in Committees on SwissRN

item.title: Organisation
item.description: Go to: Steering Committee Institutions Stakeholders Advisory Board Coordinator Steering Committee The steering committee is responsible for the overall coordination of SwissRN activity and strategy. Institution Unit Name University of Zurich Faculty of Science and Faculty of Medicine, Center for Reproducible Science Leonhard Held University of Geneva Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences, Swiss Open Psychological Science Initiative Evie Vergauwe University of Bern Vetsuisse Faculty Bern, Swiss 3R Competence Centre Hanno Würbel Institutions Member institutions of the SwissRN are formally committed to support the aims of SwissRN and have begun implementing them.
